tool_description: This api plans a vacation for you and provides a day by day plan. It uses a modified version of gpt-3.5-turbo to generate the response. Just give it some parameters and recieve back some vacation plans!
name: AI Vacation Planner
title: AI Vacation Planner

api_list.name: Vacation Plan
api_list.description: This endpoint will accept query params for location, days and interests and provide you with a vacation plan!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-vacation-planner.p.rapidapi.com/vacationplan/austin/4/sightseeing,shopping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-vacation-planner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-vacation-planner.p.rapidapi.com/vacationplan/{location}/{days}/{interests}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-vacation-planner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
